column5: Where can I fish around this resort?

If you want to fish for Trout, the upper Nottawasaga (and various headwater tributaries) flow through Hockley Valley - in addition to Rainbow parr and smolts, there are a few Brookies and Browns to be found.  Island Lake in Orangeville is close - you can fish for Pike, Perch, LM Bass a Crappie).
Its nearly 100% private and posted.  If you do end up finding somewhere to fish it, please squeeze the barbs down on your hooks... you will see why.

I lived less than 5 minutes from Hockley Valley Resort for most of my life and for me the best fishing in the area is Island Lake in Orangeville.  Lots of small pike and as of June 26th the bass bite is good also.  I`d go give Island Lake a shot and see if you can pull in a pike or two.
Drive up and down the side rds following tribs.Some culverts will produce a surprise.Bring barbless hooks and non organic bait, just in case.
